mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commit_log ( github_repo_id, user_account_id, github_commit_sha, committed_at, message, html_url, additions, deletions, total_changes, files_changed, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{githubRepoId}, #{userAccountId}, #{githubCommitSha}, #{committedAt}, #{message}, #{htmlUrl}, #{additions}, #{deletions}, #{totalChanges}, #{filesChanged}, NOW(), NOW() )
